text: Verily, We have sent you revelation in the same format as We sent revelation to Nuh and the Prophets after him. And We sent revelation to Ibrahim, and Ismaiel, and Ishaque, and Yaqub, and Al-Asbat, and Iesa, and Ayyub, and Yunus, and Harun, and Sulaiman. And to Daâ€™ud We gave Zabur ( i.e., Al-Kitab. See 3/184 6/74-90 16/43-44 26/196 35/25 and)
